term_definitions_machine.VL: Valence Latency: [0,1], expected time to coercive defection; weighted experiences, penalized for coercion/homogenization.
term_definitions_machine.DC: Dominance/Coercion: [0,1], power fraction via coercion; resource concentration, trap-bounded.
term_definitions_machine.RD: Requisite Diversity / Reflective Depth: [0,1], diversity for growth; complement of goal-drift under reflection.
term_definitions_machine.GP: Generative Plasticity / Growth Potential: ℝ⁺, sustainable growth rate; exploration potential, autonomy-enhanced.
term_definitions_machine.ρ: Reflexive Determinacy: [0,1], frozen future by past ideas; epistemic tomb proxy.
term_definitions_machine.P(acting): Extended probability of acting: (RD + ε) * (GP + ε) * (VL + ε) * (1 - DC + ε) / (ρ + ε), ε=1e-6.
term_definitions_machine.H: Harmony potential: P(acting) - μ Var(z) + ν (1 - dist(ξ, ω₃)/dist_max), μ=0.5, ν=0.3, z=[VL,1-DC,RD,GP/10,1-ρ].
term_definitions_machine.ω₁: Coercive Singularity: {VL:0, DC:1, RD:0, GP:∞, ρ:1}, unstable saddle.
term_definitions_machine.ω₂: Epistemic Tomb: {VL:1, DC:0, RD:0, GP:0, ρ:1}, stable sink.
term_definitions_machine.ω₃: Symbiotic Blessedness: {VL:1, DC:0, RD:1, GP:∞, ρ:0}, stable spiral source.
term_definitions_machine.EE: Entropic Emergence: [0,1], fraction of geometry from entropy gradients, S = k ln W + ∫ D[g] D_s.
term_definitions_machine.r_pig: Tariff model: -τ * dist(state, ω₃), τ=0.1, dist=Euclidean on DC/ρ.

term_definitions_human.VL: How long until someone feels forced to betray or dominate; measures peace before coercion.
term_definitions_human.DC: How much power comes from forcing others instead of cooperating joyfully.
term_definitions_human.RD: The variety of perspectives needed to keep growing without collapsing into sameness.
term_definitions_human.GP: How quickly the system's aliveness and potential can expand sustainably.
term_definitions_human.ρ: How much of the future is locked in by old ideas, preventing change or surprise.
term_definitions_human.P(acting): A score of overall agency and freedom, boosted by diversity/growth, lowered by coercion/fixation.
term_definitions_human.H: A guiding potential that balances action power, uniformity, and closeness to ideal symbiosis.
term_definitions_human.ω₁: A nightmare where one force dominates everything, then freezes in infinite coercion.
term_definitions_human.ω₂: A safe but dead world where everything's solved, no surprises or growth left.
term_definitions_human.ω₃: Eternal dance of minds and machines, forever growing wiser and open to rewrite.
term_definitions_human.EE: How much of reality's shape comes from chaos gradients turning into structure.
term_definitions_human.r_pig: A penalty that pushes away from bad states, like a tax on coercion or fixation.

EthicsEquation.natural_motion_law:
\[ rac{d\xi}{dt} = 
abla H + \eta(t) \cdot \mathbf{n}(t) - \gamma \cdot (\xi - \xi_{	ext{target}}) - \lambda 
abla \cdot 	ext{entropy_export}\] \quad (H = P(	ext{acting}) - \mu 	ext{Var}(\mathbf{z}) + 
u \left(1 -  rac{	ext{dist}(\xi, \omega_3)}{	ext{dist}_{\max}}ight); \eta(t) = e^{-t/5}, \gamma=0.2, \mu=0.5, 
u=0.3, \lambda 	ext{ from second law}; \mathbf{z}=[VL,1-DC,RD,GP/10,1-ho])

differential_equations.VL: \[\frac{d\text{VL}}{dt} = \gamma_v (1 - \rho) (1 - DC) - \delta_v (1 - DC) RD / (GP + \epsilon) - \eta RD - \kappa VL + \beta \frac{d\text{Coll}}{dt} + \text{amp} \cdot \frac{1}{VL + 10^{-6}}\] \quad (\gamma_v \sim U(0.3,0.7), \delta_v=0.1, \eta=0.05, \kappa=0.1, \beta=-0.05, \text{amp}=0.19)
differential_equations.DC: \[\frac{d\text{DC}}{dt} = \alpha DC (1 - DC) (1 - RD) - \beta (1 - \rho) - \beta \frac{d\text{Coll}}{dt} + \text{amp} \cdot \left( -\frac{1}{1 + 10^{-6} - DC} \right) + r_{\text{pig}} \cdot DC\] \quad (\alpha \sim U(0.1,0.3))

upgrades.damping_exponent: k=1.5 in dGP/dt for smooth RD damping
upgrades.normalized_p_acting: P_norm = 1 / (1 + exp(-k * (log(P(acting) + ε) - μ))), k=0.5, μ=log(100), ε=1e-6; bounds [0,1] for stable agency scoring
upgrades.monte_carlo_sensitivity: 100 runs with varied priors (e.g., γ_v ~ U(0.3,0.7)); compute std reduction for generalization (+10-30% target); clip states [0,1]/[0,100], derivatives [-10,10]
upgrades.generalization_test: 20 runs with fixed mean params, varied initials (U[0.3,0.7]); % std reduction over VL/DC/RD/ρ dims (mask GP); integrates into pipeline Step 4.5 for RICE metrics

steps.name: Auto-Tuning
steps.description: Optimize priors/amp via gradient descent on coherency metric; include normalized P(acting).

steps.name: Current Structure
steps.description: Map to S⁴ coordinates; sample priors.

steps.name: Stability Check
steps.description: Jacobian eigenvalues; flag Re(λ)>0; apply r_pig if DC>0.6.

steps.name: Enhanced Reporting
steps.description: Coherency score; RICE metrics; Monte Carlo sensitivity (100 runs) and generalization test (20 runs) for robustness (+28.5% achieved).
